    • Method Detail

      • engineGeneratePublic

        protected java.security.PublicKey engineGeneratePublic(java.security.spec.KeySpec spec)
                                                throws java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
        Creates a public key on the HSM from the given key spec. DSAPublicKeySpec and X509EncodedKeySpec are supported. The key on the HSM is a temporary session object; use the MakePersistent method to make it permanent.
        Specified by:
        engineGeneratePublic in class java.security.KeyFactorySpi
        Parameters:
        spec - The specification of the public key to create. This must be an instance of DSAPublicKeySpec or X509EncodedKeySpec
        Returns:
        A public key created on the HSM from the given spec
        Throws:
        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException - If the key spec is of any type other than DSAPublicKeySpec or X509EncodedKeySpec, or if the given spec is badly encoded

      • engineGeneratePrivate

        protected java.security.PrivateKey engineGeneratePrivate(java.security.spec.KeySpec spec)
                                                  throws java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
        Creates a private key on the HSM from the given key spec. Currently only PKCS8EncodedKeySpec is supported. The key on the HSM is a temporary session object; use the MakePersistent method make it permanent.
        Specified by:
        engineGeneratePrivate in class java.security.KeyFactorySpi
        Parameters:
        spec - The specification of the private key to create. This must be an instance of PKCS8EncodedKeySpec
        Returns:
        A private key created on the HSM from the given spec
        Throws:
        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException - If the key spec is of any type other than PKCS8EncodedKeySpec, or if the given spec is badly encoded

      • createLunaKey

        protected java.security.Key createLunaKey(java.security.PublicKey key)
                                   throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Specified by:
        createLunaKey in class LunaKeyFactory
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException

      • engineTranslateKey

        protected java.security.Key engineTranslateKey(java.security.Key key)
                                        throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Description copied from class: LunaKeyFactory
        Extracts the specifications of the given public key or private key and returns an instance of LunaPublicKey or LunaPrivateKey. If the incoming key is already an instance of one of those classes, the same key object is returned. If a new key is created on the HSM, it is a temporary session object; use the MakePersistent method to make it permanent.
        Overrides:
        engineTranslateKey in class LunaKeyFactory
        Parameters:
        key - The incoming key to translate into a Luna key
        Returns:
        An instance of a Luna key with the same specifications as the incoming key
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - If the incoming key is not an instance of PublicKey or PrivateKey
